Verses: 1 yobu Pinnum Than Prasanga Vaakkiyaththaith Thodarndhu Sonnadhu:
2 en Suvaasam Ennilum, Dhevan Thandha Aavi En Naasiyilum Irukkumattum,
3 en Udhadugal Theemaiyai Solvadhumillai; En Naakku Kabadam Pesuvadhumillaiyendru,
4 en Nyaayaththaith Thallividugira Dhevanum, En Aaththumaavaik Kasappaakkugira Sarvavallavarumaanavarudaiya Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren.
5 neengal Pesugiradhu Needhiyendru Naan Oththukkolvadhu Enakku Dhooramaayiruppadhaaga; En Aavi Piriyumattum En Uththamaththai Ennaivittu Vilakken.
6 en Needhiyaik Kettiyaaip Pidiththirukkiren; Adhai Naan Vittuviden; Naan Uyirodirukkumalavum En Irudhayam Ennai Nindhikkaadhu.
7 en Pagaignan Aagaadhavanaippolum, Enakku Virodhamaai Ezhumbugiravan Akkiramakkaaranaippolum Iruppaanaaga.
8 maayakkaaran Porulaith Thedi Vaiththirundhaalum, Dhevan Avan Aaththumaavai Eduththukkollumpodhu, Avan Nambikkai Enna?
9 aabaththu Avanmel Varumpodhu, Dhevan Avan Kooppidudhalaik Ketpaaro?
10 avan Sarvavallavarmel Manamagizhchchiyaayiruppaano? Avan Eppozhudhum Dhevanaith Thozhudhukondiruppaano?
11 dhevanudaiya Karaththin Kiriyaiyaik Kuriththu Ungalukku Ubadhesippen; Sarvavallavaridaththil Irukkiradhai Naan Maraikkamaatten.
12 idho, Neengal Ellaarum Adhaik Kandirundhum, Neengal Iththanai Veen Ennankondirukkiradhu Enna?
13 pollaadha Manushanukku Dhevanidaththilirundhu Varugira Pangum, Kodoorakkaarar Sarvavallavaraal Adaigira Sudhandharamum Ennavenil,
14 avanudaiya Kumaarar Peruginaal Pattayaththukku Iraiyaavaargal; Avan Karppappirappugal Aagaaraththinaal Thirupthiyaavadhillai.
15 avanukku Meedhiyaanavargal Seththup Pudhaikkappaduvaargal; Avanudaiya Vidhavaigal Pulambuvadhillai.
16 avan Puzhudhiyaippolap Panaththaik Kuviththukkondaalum, Mannaippola Vasthirangalai Savadhariththaalum,
17 avan Savadhariththadhai Needhimaan Uduththikkondu, Kutramillaadhavan Avan Panaththaip Pagirndhukolluvaan.
18 avanudaiya Veedu Pottuppoochchi Kattina Veettaippolum, Kaavalkaakkiravan Potta Kudisaiyaippolumaagum.
19 avan Aisuvariyavaanaaith Thoongik Kidandhu, Ondrum Parikodaadheponaalum, Avan Than Kangalaith Thirakkumpodhu Ondrumillaadhirukkum.
20 vellaththaippola Thigilgal Avanai Vaarikkondupogum; Raakkaalaththil Perungaatru Avanai Adiththukkondupogum.
21 kondalkaatru Avanaith Thookkikkondupoga, Avan Poividuvaan; Adhu Avanai Avan Sthalaththilirundhu Thallikkondupogum.
22 avar Ivaigalai Avanmel Varappanni Avanaith Thappavidaadhiruppaar; Avarudaiya Kaikkuth Thappiyodap Paarppaan.
23 janangal Avanaip Paarththuk Kaikotti, Avanai Avan Sthalaththaivittu Veruttividuvaargal.
